summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Zoq social media app. Backend APIs are mostly functional (13/14 tests passed), but frontend has critical authentication flow issues preventing access to main app features.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns status 200 instead of expected 201 for post creation
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - functionality works but status code inconsistency

critical_bugs.issue: After successful registration/login, user remains on auth page instead of being redirected to main app
critical_bugs.symptoms: Token is stored in localStorage but checkAuth function fails to authenticate user

critical_bugs.issue: Console shows 'No routes matched location "/auth"' indicating routing configuration problem
critical_bugs.symptoms: App tries to navigate to /auth route which doesn't exist in current setup

ui_bugs.issue: Cannot access main app features (Feed, Messages, Friends, Profile) due to authentication flow failure

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix authentication flow in App.js. The checkAuth function is not properly validating stored tokens, preventing users from accessing the main app after successful registration/login. Also fix routing issue where app tries to navigate to non-existent /auth route.
